client_description_Summary_Note:
Voutilainen Laine Mäkinen and the RM were introduced at a gourmet food festival in Helsinki. They shared a love for culinary arts and decided to explore investment opportunities in the food industry together.
Voutilainen Laine Mäkinen is a 34 year old Research Scientist from Finland.
He was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Voutilainen Laine Mäkinen is currently divorced. His child is named Kristiina.
client_description_Education_Background:
Voutilainen finished secondary school at Varkauden lukio in 2009.
Voutilainen finished his studies at Diaconia University of Applied Sciences in 2015.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Voutilainen Laine Mäkinen is a 34 year old Research Scientist from Finland.
Voutilainen Laine Mäkinen's first role was as a Research Scientist at Orion Corporation, where he worked diligently from 2014 till now to establish a strong reputation.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He managed to save approximately 100000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
Client does not have any properties.
Following the passing of his grandmother, a successful Oil and Gas Executive, he received an inheritance of 4260000 EUR in 2017, which he has used to secure his financial future.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
